Hesed of the Black Anvil Guild:
I've been waiting for you! So you met Verna, huh? She said someone called WinningSheen came to ask her all kinds of questions about Mother Nornil, and wanted to talk to you again. You must have really impressed her, huh? She remembers your name!
So why don't you go see her if you're not busy? Since she's looking for you and all.
